actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to permit the States to provide financial assistance to religiously affiliated schools.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Provides that no State shall be barred by the First Amendment to the Constitution from providing financial assistance to a religiously affiliated school.

titles.title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to permit the States to provide financial assistance to religiously affiliated schools.
